project_description: Residential roof replacement. Removing existing shingle roof application down to plywood deck. Installing self-adhered valley liner. Installing Tamko Titan XT (Class 3, 30 year) shingle roof system
reasoning: Lead is stale (18 days for a roof, which goes stale in 2 weeks) and property value is low ($260k), indicating price sensitivity. However, detailed project description and homeowner applicant show some intent.
